detail_desc: Metal chain necklace with faceted plastic stone pendants. Adjustable length 49-57 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Captain’s cap in twill made from a cotton blend with a braided cord. Lined.
Top in cotton jersey and a lace skirt. Top with a round neckline and short lace sleeves. Skirt with an elasticated waist and jersey lining.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with a concealed silicone trim and short sleeves. Overlocked edge around the top, sleeves and hem.
Wide corset belt in grained imitation leather with lacing at the front and elastic with a metal fastener at the back. Width 10 cm, length 72 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleat at the front and a double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with contrasting colour seams. High waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Fully lined bikini with a lace pattern. Top with narrow shoulder straps and three layers of frills. Bottoms with a frill trim at the top.
Warm-lined boots in shiny imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 2 cm.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a wrapover front for easier nursing access and lined cups with removable inserts. Elastication at the hem and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar with a concealed hood that has an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Lined.
Short jersey dress with a small gathered collar and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves. Unlined.
Boxy top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge, cut-off hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit hat in soft wool with earflaps. Pompoms on the top and on the earflaps. Cotton jersey lining.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at one side and at the crotch.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Straight-style top in an airy, fine knit containing glittery threads with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Rain jacket with sealed seams, fastenings down the front, a detachable hood and long raglan sleeves. Jersey lining.
Shorts in a crinkled viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, decorative ties at the front and a small frill trim at the top.
Jumper in a textured pima cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft pattern knit with hole-knit sections, long, wide sleeves and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and top and reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details and a padded, ankle-length shaft with a faux fur trim. Adjustable elasticated lacing at the front, a zip in the side and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, A-line dress in crinkled chiffon with a stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.
Short, flounced dress in soft, woven viscose with a wrapover front, long-sleeves, a seam at the waist and a tie at the side. Unlined.
Block-coloured polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Mules in imitation suede with pointed toes. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neck, flounces down the front, and buttons at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Imitation suede espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, lacing at the front and a heel strap at the back. Imitation leather linings, imitation suede insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform 4 cm.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front, triangular cups and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Open back and a seam at the waist with wide decorative elastic with transparent sections.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Blouse in a crinkled weave containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with a frill trim around the shoulders. Lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.

Short-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Waistcoat in a cotton and linen weave with fake front pockets and buttons down the front. Bow tie in twill with a slight sheen. The bow tie has an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in a textured weave with a regular elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.

Short cape in beaded mesh made from recycled polyester with shoulder pads for defined shoulders and decorative beaded fringes. Decorative sparkly stone and bead appliqués made from recycled materials. Concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Can also be fastened with ties under the arms.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Strappy top in a sturdy, textured knit with a V-neck front and back.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Knitted, knee-length skirt with a ribbed waistband.
Small, glittery shoulder bag with embroidery and appliqués. Flap with a hook and loop fastening and a narrow, glittery fabric shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 3x7x11 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jacket in a jacquard weave with decorative piping, covered buttons at the front, patch front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides.
Pool shoes with a wide fabric hook and loop tab with two fasteners. Soft rubber soles with a fluted underside.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave. Lined. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Trousers in jersey crêpe with a slight sheen, with a high waist and straight legs.

Straight skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high paper bag waist and zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Wide, detachable tie belt, patch pockets with a folded edge at the top, and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in waffled jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Dungarees in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, organic cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps, opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads and an elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Desert boots in imitation suede with lacing at the front and decorative welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm. The boots are made partly from recycled polyester.

Knee-length dress in embroidered airy chiffon with a collar and opening at the front with decorative ties. Short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves, a concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Hairband of braided imitation suede with decorative fabric flowers and elastic at the back of the neck.
Fitted strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Lined bikini top with no fasteners. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and elastication at the hem.
Block-heeled ankle boots with a zip on the inside. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Top in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and gathered seams to create added volume and soft draping.

Calf-length dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top. Covered buttons down the front and a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Short dress in sturdy jersey decorated with sparkly stones. Concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit with wide ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey fancy dress cape with a hood with appliqués and a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
Short wrap skirt in a linen and viscose weave with a flounced trim at the front and hem. High waist with a concealed button at one side and ties at the other. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Fitted top in a soft rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck.

Jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a lace yoke and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. Short lace sleeves with a flounce, an elasticated seam and sewn-in fabric tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Non-wired push-up bra in lace and mesh with moulded, lightly padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Wide jumper in a soft, chunky jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck and low dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed, rounded hem. Longer at the back.
